name: Across Time (Prisma Games)
description:
This game was made as a part of the Western Balkans 2022 Digital Summit Game Jam, where the theme was "Everything is connected".

Explore this fantasy world by traveling through to the past, and unlocking paths you otherwise can't. Time only goes forward, so any changes you make in the past, affect the future, but not the opposite!

Staying in the past costs energy, so be careful with how long you do so!
